Package ohos.agp.render

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Texture

  • public class Texture
extends Object
    Stores the pixelmap file representing the drawing result.

    This class defines an image as a pixelmap file consisting of pixels, each of which can be represented by multiple colors. Canvas is used for drawing, and the drawing result is stored in Texture.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Texture.AlphaType
      Enumerates alpha types of the texture.
      static class  Texture.ColorType
      Enumerates pixel formats of the texture.

      Texture​(PixelMap pixelMap)
      A constructor used to create a Texture instance for off-screen rendering based on the specified pixel map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture

        public Texture​(int width,
               int height,
               Texture.ColorType colorType,
               Texture.AlphaType alphaType)
        A constructor used to create a Texture instance with the specified height, width, pixel color format, and the way to interpret alpha.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width of the texture.
        height - Indicates the height of the texture.
        colorType - Indicates the pixel color format of the texture.
        alphaType - Indicates how to interpret the alpha of the texture.
        Since:
        3

      • Texture

        public Texture​(PixelMap pixelMap)
        A constructor used to create a Texture instance for off-screen rendering based on the specified pixel map.
        Parameters:
        pixelMap - Indicates the background image used for off-screen rendering.
        Since:
        3

    • Method Detail

      • getPixelMap

        public PixelMap getPixelMap​()
        Obtains the PixelMap instance with the off-screen rendering result.

        All drawing operations are performed on the specified PixelMap.

        Returns:
        Returns the PixelMap instance with the off-screen rendering result.
        Since:
        3
